title: New: Verlaine – Painted Lights
body:
The tag ‘Emotional indie rock’ hardly sells your own music, immediately drawing comparisons to the likes of **Snow Patrol**, **Coldplay** and of course kings of the genre; **U2**.

Don’t let that put you off [**Verlaine**](http://verlainemusic.com/) however, as their debut track _Painted Lights_ may verge into epically cheesy guitar pop, it’s the strength of the songwriting, and the tenderness, particularly in the latter section of the track, that make it such an appealing listen. ‘_So, tonight is all we have, to make this moment last_‘ may be a lyric worthy of One Direction, but _Painted Lights_ is just about the right side of stadium ready anthems. Check it out below
